about_the_game:
Expand your MudRunner experience with Free DLC, The Ridge!

Roll out with 2 new vehicles in a brand new map situated on the edge of a coast. A huge mountain ridge sits in the center and travelling between the two halves of the map will be a great challenge!

To complete these objectives players will have to scavenge the map searching for fallen logs at different locations.

Included in this DLC, a whole new map, 2 new vehicles and their addons:
  • A new map, The Ridge
  • The D-538, a heavy-duty tractor
  • Spare wheel addon
  • Fuel canisters addon
  • A loader addon
  • The B-6A, a lighter weight tractor.
  • Fuel canisters addon
  • Utility (fuel/repairs) trailer
  • Fuel trailer

Roll out with 2 new vehicles in a brand new map situated on the edge of a coast. A huge mountain ridge sits in the center and travelling between the two halves of the map will be a great challenge!

To complete these objectives players will have to scavenge the map searching for fallen logs at different locations.

Included in this DLC, a whole new map, 2 new vehicles and their addons:

legal_notice: © 2017 MudRunner. A game developed by Saber Interactive and published by Focus Home Interactive. MudRunner is a trademark of Saber Interactive Inc. All rights reserved.
name: MudRunner - The Ridge DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR GAME ACTIVATION AND ONLINE GAME. Gamepad Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows. Confirmed Steering Wheel support for Logitech G25/G27 - Other models have not been tested. This game is a 32-bit application.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 2.5GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR GAME ACTIVATION AND ONLINE GAME. Gamepad Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows. Confirmed Steering Wheel support for Logitech G25/G27 - Other models have not been tested. This game is a 32-bit application.

short_description: Expand your MudRunner experience with The Ridge Free DLC! Roll out with 2 new vehicles in a new map where a huge mountain ridge sits in the center. Travel across this steepy environment, challenge yourself by scavenging the map and complete demanding objectives!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
